class hidrocl.variables.HidroCLVariable(name, database, pcdatabase)[source]¶

Bases: object

A class to hold information about a hidrocl variable

Name of the variable

Type:

str

database¶

Path to the database

Type:

str

pcdatabase¶

Path to the database with pixel count

Type:

str

indatabase¶

Type:

list

observations¶

Type:

pandas.DataFrame

pcobservations¶

Dataframe with the pixel count

Type:

pandas.DataFrame

List of catchment names

Type:

list
